Package org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.performance.matcher

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DisbursementsAfterActivityDateMatcher
    The matcher checks if there are disbursements happened after a selected activity date
    DisbursementsAfterActivityDateMatcherTests
    A disbursement happened after (transaction date itself) the project closing date
    NoDisbursementsAfterFundingDateMatcher
    The matcher checks if no disbursments were entered after certain period has passed from the selected funding date
    NoDisbursementsAfterFundingDateMatcherTests
    A period have passed since the project signature date and still no disbursement from donor
    NoUpdatedDisbursementsAfterTimePeriodMatcher
    The matcher checks if no disbursements were updated during a certain period
    NoUpdatedDisbursementsAfterTimePeriodMatcherTests
    Disbursements (actual or planned) from one or more donor have not been updated in the last 3 months
    NoUpdatedStatusAfterFundingDateMatcher
    The matcher checks if the activity is in a certain status after certain period has passed from the selected funding date
    NoUpdatedStatusAfterFundingDateMatcherTests
    3 months went by after the contract signature date and the project status was not modified from planned to ongoing
    PerformanceRuleMatcher  
    PerformanceRuleMatcherPossibleValuesSupplierTests  
    PerformanceRuleMatcherTests
